duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all accounting operations including cash and risk management, timely financial reports, and maintenance of accounting records.
Provide strategic advice on the accounting/finance implications of the business strategies and plans.
Effectively hire, train, and lead accounting team, communicate clearly, set expectations, provide feedback, and resolve conflicts.
Lead financial and business process improvements, oversee monthly, quarterly, and annual closing processes, and manage technical accounting matters.
Collaborate with functional leaders to interpret operating results and make operational adjustments as needed to reach set goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Accounting, CPA preferred (MBA or related degree preferred)
